title: How does ethical relativism differ from cultural relativism? How are they related? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ethical relativism regards individual morality. Cultural relativism regards societal norms. One says each person has a unique moral perspective. The other says societies differ in customs and regulatory principles. One should also add that some moralities are inferior, others superior; just as some cultures are inferior and some superior. It is still a manner of perspective.
